meanings.definition: Relating to the scientific study of the oceans.
meanings.sent1: The oceanographic research vessel set sail to study marine life.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use oceanographic tools to measure ocean temperatures.
meanings.sent3: The oceanographic team discovered a new species of fish with googly eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an oceanographic map, filled with mysteries waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The oceanographic expedition uncovered ancient shipwrecks on the ocean floor.

meanings.sent1: Oceanographic studies help us understand the behavior of ocean currents.
meanings.sent2: The oceanographic institute conducts research on marine ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The oceanographic conference featured a talk on deep-sea exploration.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts drifted like oceanographic waves, ebbing and flowing.
meanings.sent5: The oceanographic textbook provided detailed information on ocean habitats.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the exploration and study of the ocean.
meanings.sent1: The oceanographic mission aimed to uncover the secrets of the deep sea.
meanings.sent2: Oceanographic expeditions require specialized equipment for underwater research.
meanings.sent3: The oceanographic team celebrated a successful dive with a seafood feast.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for oceanographic exploration knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The oceanographic documentary captured the beauty and mystery of the ocean.
